TopicTitle: You know you have too many asteroids tracked when...

Articles.Content:
when you have 151 asteroids tracked and have to force yourself to stop tracking more because theres starting to be a noticable frame decrease

![Kt9BC3v.png](http://i.imgur.com/Kt9BC3v.png)

I already have a ship in orbit ready to catch a B class thats gunna encounter in about 14 days, i may want to launch several more ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Christ.

Why do you have so many tracked? You're giving the sun a ring system? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
You should make a Millenium Falcon (If you know what i'm sayin') ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Christ.
> Why do you have so many tracked? You're giving the sun a ring system? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

or building a second kerbin ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

but yeah i got carried away tracking asteroids during timewarp (was struggling to keep up) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

im sure they'll all be swarmming through kerbins SOI soon,

btw, i have one tracked that has an apo above duna's orbit, maybe i should try and send it to duna lol

edit: i reloaded a quicksave that was before my asteroid tracking spree and now im back down to 60 ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

TRACK ALL TEH ASTEROIDS!!!

- - - Updated - - -

![AsNewEB.png](http://i.imgur.com/AsNewEB.png)

now 206 asteroids. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

i had a couple spawn in kerbins soi for some reason.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T23:51:40Z" title="05/01/2015 11:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by Deadpangod3**
I immediately thought of [this](http://www.tubechop.com/watch/5827483) moment from N^3^ video. Maybe someone else will get a chuckle out of it as well.

> 
> edit: i reloaded a quicksave that was before my asteroid tracking spree and now im back down to 60 ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> TRACK ALL TEH ASTEROIDS!!!

Explains the sudden urgent need for Kerbal-kind to colonize the stars, they just figured out that Kerbin is in the middle of an asteroid belt! 

Seriously though, you do have an option to "stop tracking" an asteroid in the tracking station. No need to revert your whole save.

> 
> Explains the sudden urgent need for Kerbal-kind to colonize the stars, they just figured out that Kerbin is in the middle of an asteroid belt! 
> Seriously though, you do have an option to "stop tracking" an asteroid in the tracking station. No need to revert your whole save.

i know, it was accidental.

> 
> when you have 151 asteroids tracked and have to force yourself to stop tracking more because theres starting to be a noticable frame decrease
> [http://i.imgur.com/Kt9BC3v.png](http://i.imgur.com/Kt9BC3v.png)
> 
> I already have a ship in orbit ready to catch a B class thats gunna encounter in about 14 days, i may want to launch several more ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

DEADPAN WHAT HAVE YOU DONE XDDDD. That is awesome. Jeb would be pleased.
